message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $85 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $90. This is a fair price for both of us, and it ensures we can close this deal.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
